name: iAcquire
description:
iAcquire is a content marketing agency that helps clients become great content brands. We connect today's empowered consumer to the information they need through the search and social channels they prefer.
We develop content assets that work for years through a careful four-stage process of analysis, strategy, development, and engagement. Leveraging search and social listening tools also allow us to uncover and develop trending written and creative content.
